title: Introduction to Python

title: instructions
text: Python is a programming language that has gained popularity in all types of data science. On this introductory course, we are aiming at getting acquainted with the basic syntax of Python, as well as learning how to extend this basic functionality by calling powerful modules built by members of the large Python user community. Thus, we take a “standing on the shoulders of giants” approach to Python.

text analysis, latent content features, sentiment analysis, topic modelling

2022-10-20
image analysis, latent content features, object recognition, captioning
opencv, pytorch


2022-10-21
reproducible data analysis, data visualization, sharing and collaborating
matplotlib

title: topics
text:
Python is a programming language that has gained popularity in all types of data science. On this introductory course, we are aiming at getting acquainted with the basic syntax of Python, as well as learning how to extend this basic functionality by calling powerful modules built by members of the large Python user community. Thus, we take a “standing on the shoulders of giants” approach to Python.. check out for more info.
